layout.footer: Â© 2025 HELP VLM Research Foundation. All rights reserved.

texts.li1: Lock HELP on Base to mint sHELP on Sonic
texts.li2: Burn sHELP on Sonic to unlock HELP on Base
texts.text3: Supply is always 1:1 and fully backed.
texts.text4: Base and Sonic share the same address format, so your connected wallet address will be used on both chains.
